mapper.sql: id, start_prescription, end_prescription, quota, price_unit, ptype, org_id, org_name, area_bn, area_name, country_bn, country_name, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from performance_indicators
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into performance_indicators (id, start_prescription, end_prescription, quota, price_unit, ptype, org_id, org_name, area_bn, area_name, country_bn, country_name, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startPrescription,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endPrescription,jdbcType=DATE}, #{quota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into performance_indicators
id,
start_prescription,
end_prescription,
quota,
price_unit,
ptype,

org_name,

area_name,

mapper.update:
update performance_indicators
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_prescription = #{record.startPrescription,jdbcType=DATE},
end_prescription = #{record.endPrescription,jdbcType=DATE},
quota = #{record.quota,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
price_unit = #{record.priceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ptype = #{record.ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_id = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_name = #{record.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_bn = #{record.areaBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_name = #{record.areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_bn = #{record.countryBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_name = #{record.countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_name = #{record.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update performance_indicators set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_prescription = #{record.startPrescription,jdbcType=DATE}, end_prescription = #{record.endPrescription,jdbcType=DATE}, quota = #{record.quota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price_unit = #{record.priceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptype = #{record.ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_id = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_name = #{record.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_bn = #{record.areaBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{record.areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_bn = #{record.countryBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_name = #{record.countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_name = #{record.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update performance_indicators
start_prescription = #{startPrescription,jdbcType=DATE},
end_prescription = #{endPrescription,jdbcType=DATE},
quota = #{quota,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
price_unit = #{priceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ptype = #{ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_bn = #{areaBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_bn = #{countryBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_name = #{countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update performance_indicators set start_prescription = #{startPrescription,jdbcType=DATE}, end_prescription = #{endPrescription,jdbcType=DATE}, quota = #{quota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price_unit = #{priceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptype = #{ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_bn = #{areaBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_bn = #{countryBn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_name = #{countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.start_prescription AS startPrescription, t1.end_prescription AS endPrescription, t1.quota, t1.org_id, t2.`name` as `name` FROM erui_report.performance_indicators t1 LEFT JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id WHERE ptype = 1 AND t1.start_prescription <= #{endTime} AND t1.end_prescription >= #{startTime}

SELECT t1.start_prescription AS startPrescription, t1.end_prescription AS endPrescription, t1.quota, t1.country_bn, t2.`name` as `name` FROM erui_report.performance_indicators t1 LEFT JOIN erui_dict.country t2 ON t1.country_bn = t2.bn AND t2.lang = 'zh' WHERE ptype = 2 AND t1.start_prescription <= #{endTime} AND t1.end_prescription >= #{startTime}

SELECT t1.start_prescription AS startPrescription, t1.end_prescription AS endPrescription, t1.quota, t1.area_bn, t2.`name` as `name` FROM erui_report.performance_indicators t1 LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area t2 ON t1.area_bn = t2.bn AND t2.lang = 'zh' WHERE ptype = 2 AND t1.start_prescription <= #{endTime} AND t1.end_prescription >= #{startTime}
